content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `keep_only_names` which iterates over the provided list of words (`words`) and removes all words that do not start with a capital letter (eg, remove "dog" but keep "Dog").

Here is an implementation in Julia:

```julia
function keep_only_names(words)
    result = []
    for word in words
        if islowercase(word[1]) || !ismatch("^[A-Z]", word)
            continue
        else
            push!(result, word)
        end
    end
    return result
end
```
This function goes through each word in the input list (`words`) and checks if it starts with a lowercase letter or does not start with an uppercase letter. If either condition is true, it skips that word and moves on to the next one. If both conditions are false (meaning the word starts with an uppercase letter), it adds the word to the result array (`result`).
